messages.message:
i always build `core-platform-service` Dockerâ€™s image locally using crafting by running
1. `cs port-forward -W buildfarm/buildfarm`
2. `make build-docker CRAFTING_RBE_ENABLED=1` in another terminal in the `core-services/core-platform-service` folder
this has worked without issue in the past since december (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C035SLYCJ9X/p1702086991047649?thread_ts=1702082499.264919&cid=C035SLYCJ9X), but today i got this error
`Unknown: dial tcp 10.253.139.29:8980: connect: connection refused`

i see these errors in the buildfarm server logs  (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/logviewx/instabase/buildfarm/bf-server/containers/log%40log)- @sean.donohoe how should we clear some memory and restart the bf-server?
```Sep 11, 2024 2:24:31 AM build.buildfarm.instance.shard.DispatchedMonitor run
INFO: DispatchedMonitor: Exiting
*** shutting down gRPC server since JVM is shutting down
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
Dumping heap to java_pid1.hprof ...
Unable to create java_pid1.hprof: File exists
Error: Unable to initialize main class build.buildfarm.server.BuildFarmServer
Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space```
hey! I'll bounce all the containers, that should clear any with high memory consumption
